name: format-code
description: Automatically format code using appropriate formatters
script:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-format code files
if [[ "$1" == *.go ]]; then
  gofmt -w "$1"
elif [[ "$1" == *.js || "$1" == *.ts || "$1" == *.jsx || "$1" == *.tsx ]]; then
  npx prettier --write "$1"
elif [[ "$1" == *.py ]]; then
  black "$1"
fi
echo "Formatted: $1"
